3.13.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where blocking an IP over TCP would log error: "function cannot be called in preread phase" (#14749)

3.6.0.0.message: add support for consumer group scoping

3.4.0.0.message:
Added support for the `tcp`, `tls`, `grpc`, and `grpcs` protocols.

Thanks [@scrudge](https://github.com/scrudge) for contributing this change.[#10245](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10245)
